nodes.text: Sedra Hoxin was a constable of the prefect's office of the Mos Eisley spaceport on the planet Tatooine. In the year 19 BBY, Hoxin sent an annual Life Day greeting to Inspector Tanivos Divo of the Coruscant Security Force. The greeting had a holo of the Krayt's Claw gang of bounty hunters attached, as well as a note to Divo concerning Boba Fett, the leader of the Krayt's Claw. The inspector, who had been keeping a case file on Fett, added the holo and note to the file.
Sedra Hoxin was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
